title: v1.0.1 Update Available!
message:
Thanks for playing Math Sprint! We've just released v1.0.1 with some important updates:

**Bug Fixes**: The tutorial step 8 "View All Achievements" button now works correctly, along with several other fixes.

**New Features**: Redesigned Settings with new accessibility options and quality-of-life improvements.

Check out the full list of changes in **What's New** after dismissing this message!

Have feedback? [Share your thoughts with us](/feedback/) - we'd love to hear from you!

Happy sprinting!
